ygData.subject: Re: Words but lack of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Since words are for both necromancers and magicians you may have found 3 magi, 3 necro, 1 wiz, 0 enchanter items. This is still within the bounds of random
ygData.messageBody:
> > Wings@Karana
>
> I have found that Frogloks drop words more often than runes or pages.
> So far I found 6 words, 1 rune, 0 pages off of Frogloks. I
> believe all
> of them have been of the shamans (Gaz and Ton Shamans) as well.
>

Since words are for both necromancers and magicians you may have found

3 magi, 3 necro, 1 wiz, 0 enchanter items. This is still within the bounds
of random chance.

Though I have to admit that when fighting the cat people I found slightly
about 2X the number of words as runes + pages.

Veneficus Gnome Magician Rank 5
